name: hexagons
description: Hexagons - SEND School Pupil Progress Tracking System

scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.dev:staging: cd hexagons-client && cross-env NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL=https://backend.hexagons.app npm run develop
scripts.prod:tasmat: cd hexagons-client && cross-env NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL=https://tasmat-backend.hexagons.app npm run develop
